abstract: Connecticut State Sen Ted Kennedy Jr is leading push to create new name for 'Negro Heads' rock formation in Long Island Sound; initiates essay contest at high school in town of Branford to come up with less racially offensive moniker; move reflects similarly motivated renaming efforts across country.
lead_paragraph: It may be dwarfed by Denali, the 20,308-foot peak in Alaska long known as Mount McKinley, but the mussel-covered formation in the Long Island Sound is at the center of a naming debate of its own.

headline.main: Connecticut Rock Pile Known as Negro Heads May Get a New Name
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Town Weighs  Name of a Watery Rock Pile

snippet: It may be dwarfed by Denali, the 20,308-foot peak in Alaska long known as Mount McKinley, but the mussel-covered formation in the Long Island Sound is at the center of a naming debate of its own.
